methods.name: <init>

params.name: showBlockName
showNamespace
params.comment: if true display labels with their name-space path.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Format constructor with more options. Extended reference mark-up is
 enabled.

methods.name: getRepresentationString
methods.comment:
Returns a formatted string representation of the specified code unit,
 including mnemonic and operand(s) only.

methods.name: getRepresentationString
methods.comment:
Returns a formatted string representation of the specified code unit
 mnemonic and operand(s).

params.name: includeEOLcomment
params.comment:
if true EOL comment will be appended to code
            unit representation

methods.name: getMnemonicRepresentation
methods.comment: Returns a formatted code unit mnemonic

methods.name: getOperandRepresentationString
methods.comment:
Returns a formatted string representation of the specified code unit
 operand.

methods.javadoc:
Returns a formatted list of operand objects for the specified code unit
 operand. In the case of Data opIndex=1, this will be a list containing a
 single String object (see getDataValueRepresentation(Data)). In the case
 of an Instruction, the list will contain a list of Objects, including any
 combination of Character, String, VariableOffset, Register, Address,
 Scalar, List, LabelString etc.. All objects returned must support the
 toString() method.
@param cu code unit
@param opIndex operand index
@return list of representation objects or null for an unsupported
         language.
methods.name: getOperandRepresentationList
methods.comment:
Returns a formatted list of operand objects for the specified code unit
 operand. In the case of Data opIndex=1, this will be a list containing a
 single String object (see getDataValueRepresentation(Data)). In the case
 of an Instruction, the list will contain a list of Objects, including any
 combination of Character, String, VariableOffset, Register, Address,
 Scalar, List, LabelString etc.. All objects returned must support the
 toString() method.

return.comment:
list of representation objects or null for an unsupported
         language.

methods.name: getDataValueRepresentation
methods.comment:
Returns a formatted data value for the specified data unit. The return
 list will contain a single object which may be an instance of String,
 LabelString, Address, Scalar or Equate

return.comment: representation list containing a single object.

methods.name: getDataValueRepresentationString
methods.comment: Returns a formatted data value for the specified data unit.

methods.name: getReferenceRepresentationString
methods.comment: Returns a marked-up representation of the reference destination.

return.comment:
destination as a string or null if a suitable string could not be
         produced.
